text: The Northern Division is one of four divisions in Fiji. The capital is Labasa. The Northern Division has three Provinces: Macuata, Cakaudrove, and Bua. It includes the entire island of Vanua Levu. ==Notable people== * Ratu Sir Penaia Ganilau, the first President of Fiji * Sitiveni Rabuka, former Prime Minister Northern
title: Northern Division, Fiji
